1. entrance (on the stage); appearance (in a book, film, etc.) Antonym: 退場その女優は舞台に３度登場した。That actress made three entrances onto the stage.
2. appearance (on the scene); arrival (on the market); emergence; introduction; advent 「西遊記」の中には錬金術の話が数多く登場します。Many tales of alchemy show up in "Journey to the West".

sentences.translation: That actress made three entrances onto the stage.
Many tales of alchemy show up in "Journey to the West".
